emotional.title: Emotional

analyze.title: Decision Analysis
analyze.subtitle: Describe your decision dilemma
analyze.placeholder: Describe your decision dilemma in detail...
analyze.welcomeDescription: Ask me about any decision you're facing. I'll analyze it using {mode} thinking to help you make the best choice.
analyze.analysisReady: Your detailed decision analysis is ready below.
analyze.inputHint: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line

common.error: Something went wrong while analyzing your decision. Please try again.

howToUse.title: How to Use NexReason
howToUse.subtitle: Master the art of AI-powered decision making with our comprehensive guide

gettingStarted.title: Quick Start Guide
gettingStarted.description: Get started with NexReason in three simple steps

step1.title: Choose Your Mode
step1.description: Select analytical, emotional, or creative thinking approach

step2.title: Describe Your Decision
step2.description: Provide detailed context about your decision dilemma

decisionModes.title: Understanding Decision Modes
decisionModes.description: Choose the right thinking approach for your decision

analytical.title: Analytical Mode
analytical.description: Perfect for data-driven decisions requiring logical analysis, financial calculations, and risk assessment.

emotional.title: Emotional Mode
emotional.description: Ideal for decisions involving relationships, personal values, and life changes that impact well-being.

creative.title: Creative Mode
creative.description: Great for exploring innovative solutions, unconventional approaches, and breakthrough thinking.

tips.title: Tips for Better Results
tips.description: Follow these guidelines to get the most out of your decision analysis

tip1.title: Be Specific
tip1.description: Provide detailed context about your situation and constraints

tip2.title: Set Clear Goals
tip2.description: Clearly state your desired outcomes and priorities

tip3.title: Include Context
tip3.description: Mention relevant background information and limitations

tip4.title: Consider Timeframe
tip4.description: Specify when you need to make the decision

tip5.title: Multiple Perspectives
tip5.description: Try different modes for complex decisions

tip6.title: Stay Open-Minded
tip6.description: Be receptive to unexpected insights and solutions

examples.title: Example Questions
examples.description: Here are some examples of well-structured decision questions

career.title: Career Decision
career.question: Example Question:
career.example: Should I accept a job offer that pays 30% more but requires relocating to a different country?
career.explanation: Specific situation, clear trade-offs, and measurable factors

financial.title: Financial Decision
financial.question: Example Question:
financial.example: Should I use my savings to pay off student loans or invest in a retirement account?
financial.explanation: Clear alternatives with financial implications and long-term considerations

personal.title: Personal Decision
personal.question: Example Question:
personal.example: Should I pursue a minimalist lifestyle by selling most of my possessions and traveling?
personal.explanation: Lifestyle change with clear actions and personal values involved

profileSettings.title: Profile Settings & Personalization
profileSettings.description: Enhance your decision analysis experience by setting up your personal profile

personalized.title: Personalized Recommendations
personalized.description: Get recommendations based on your preferences and goals

cultural.title: Cultural Context
cultural.description: Receive analysis that considers your cultural background

relevant.title: Relevant Examples
relevant.description: More relevant scenarios tailored to your situation

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.description: Improved accuracy based on your decision patterns

howToSetup.title: How to Set Up Your Profile
howToSetup.step1: Click the Profile Icon in the analyze page header
howToSetup.step2: Fill in your basic information and preferences
howToSetup.step3: Set your decision-making style and goals
howToSetup.step4: Save your profile and start receiving personalized analysis

cta.title: Ready to Make Better Decisions?
cta.description: Start your decision analysis journey with NexReason's AI-powered insights

smartProfiling.title: 🤖 Smart Profiling
smartProfiling.detectedMessage: We've automatically detected your profile from your questions:
smartProfiling.usageMessage: We can provide more personalized analyses using this information.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: At NexReason, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring transparency about how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains our practices regarding the data we collect when you use our AI-powered decision analysis platform.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We collect the following types of information to provide and improve our services:

items.personal: Personal Information: Name, email address, and contact information when you create an account or contact us.
items.usage: Usage Data: Information about how you use our platform, including decision queries, analysis preferences, and interaction patterns.
items.device: Device Information: IP address, browser type, operating system, and device identifiers for security and analytics purposes.
items.cookies: Cookies and Tracking: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and gather analytics data.

items.service: Provide our AI-powered decision analysis services and personalized recommendations.
items.improve: Improve our algorithms, user experience, and develop new features.
items.support: Provide customer support and respond to your inquiries.
items.analytics: Conduct analytics and research to better understand user behavior and preferences.
items.advertising: Display relevant advertisements through Google AdSense and other advertising partners.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: We work with trusted third-party services to enhance our platform:

google.analytics: Used for website analytics and user behavior insights to improve our services.
google.adsense: Displays relevant advertisements to support our free service. AdSense may use cookies to show ads based on your interests.
google.ai: Provides the artificial intelligence capabilities that power our decision analysis features.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience, remember your preferences, and analyze website traffic. You can control cookie settings through your browser, but some features may not function properly if cookies are disabled.

items.access: Access and review the personal information we have about you.
items.correct: Request corrections to any inaccurate or incomplete information.
items.delete: Request deletion of your personal information, subject to legal requirements.
items.restrict: Request restriction of processing your personal information in certain circumstances.
items.portability: Request a copy of your personal information in a portable format.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no internet transmission is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using NexReason, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

description.title: Service Description
description.content: NexReason is an AI-powered decision analysis platform that provides insights and recommendations to help users make informed decisions. Our service uses artificial intelligence to analyze decision scenarios across analytical, emotional, and creative thinking frameworks.

usage.title: Acceptable Use
usage.intro: You agree to use NexReason responsibly and in accordance with these guidelines:

rules.lawful: Use the service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with applicable laws and regulations.
rules.personal: Use the service for personal, educational, or legitimate business purposes only.
rules.noAbuse: Do not abuse, harass, threaten, or intimidate other users or our staff.
rules.noHarm: Do not use the service to promote harmful, illegal, or unethical activities.
rules.respectRights: Respect the intellectual property rights of NexReason and third parties.

items.illegal: Using the service for any illegal activities or to violate any laws or regulations.
items.harmful: Submitting content that is harmful, threatening, abusive, or promotes violence.
items.spam: Sending spam, unsolicited communications, or excessive requests to our system.
items.infringe: Infringing on intellectual property rights or violating privacy rights of others.
items.malware: Introducing viruses, malware, or other harmful code to our platform.
items.impersonate: Impersonating others or providing false information about your identity.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, features, and functionality of NexReason, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, and software, are the exclusive property of NexReason and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.content: You retain ownership of the content you submit to NexReason. However, by submitting content, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, modify, and display your content solely for the purpose of providing our services and improving our AI algorithms.

disclaimer.title: Service Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: NexReason provides AI-generated insights and recommendations for informational purposes only. Our analysis should not be considered as professional advice for legal, financial, medical, or other specialized matters. Users are responsible for their own decisions and should consult qualified professionals when appropriate.
disclaimer.aiWarning: Important: AI-generated content may contain errors or biases. Always use critical thinking and consider multiple sources before making important decisions.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, NexReason shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses resulting from your use of our service.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your access to our service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms of Service.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be interpreted and governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which NexReason operates, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

about.title: About NexReason
about.subtitle: Empowering better decisions through artificial intelligence

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At NexReason, we believe that every decision matters. Our mission is to democratize access to intelligent decision-making tools by combining cutting-edge artificial intelligence with human wisdom. We empower individuals and organizations to make better choices through comprehensive analysis that considers logic, emotion, and creativity.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.intro: NexReason is an AI-powered decision analysis platform that transforms complex choices into clear, actionable insights. Our advanced algorithms analyze your decisions through multiple thinking frameworks:

analytical.title: Analytical Thinking
analytical.description: Data-driven analysis with logical reasoning and risk assessment.

emotional.title: Emotional Intelligence
emotional.description: Understanding the human impact and relationship dynamics of decisions.

creative.title: Creative Solutions
creative.description: Exploring innovative approaches and unconventional possibilities.

technology.title: Our Technology
technology.content: Built on state-of-the-art artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies, NexReason combines natural language processing, decision theory, and behavioral psychology to provide comprehensive decision analysis. Our platform is designed to be intuitive, secure, and continuously improving through user feedback and advanced AI training.

team.title: Our Team
team.content: NexReason is built by a diverse team of AI researchers, decision scientists, behavioral psychologists, and technology experts who are passionate about improving human decision-making. We combine decades of experience in artificial intelligence, cognitive science, and user experience design to create tools that truly make a difference.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.content: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, feedback, or partnership opportunities, our team is here to help.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help with any questions or feedback

form.title: Send us a Message
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Before reaching out, check our comprehensive guide for quick answers to common questions.
